sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Nav, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap-v5' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { listBrands } from '../actions/brandActions' import { listCategories } from '../actions/categoryActions' const Navigation = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const brandList = useSelector(state => state.brandList) const { loading, error, brands } = brandList const categoryList = useSelector(state => state.categoryList) const { categories } = categoryList useEffect(() => { dispatch(listBrands()) dispatch(listCategories()) }, [dispatch]) return ( <>
    Home
    { loading ? : error ? {error} : ( <> {brands.map(brand => ( ))}
    NAME DESCRIPTION
    {brand.name} {brand.description}
    ) } {brands.map(brand => ( <> {brand.name}
    ))}
    {categories && categories.map(category => ( <> {category.name}
    ))}
    About
) } export default Navigation
